item.title: Autoplay Feature
item.description:
Autoplay Feature

The autoplay feature on this accordion is great and can be used as a banner ad rotator something similar. Keep in mind users can still browse manually.

The amount of time spent on each picture is customizable in the XML.

The autoplay will remember the last item, even if the user browsed through them manually.

item.title: Completely resizable
item.description:
Simply use the XML height and width settings to resize it and you are ready.

You can also set the stroke size and most importantly the width at which the images will open. This will make the closed items smaller or larger.

item.title: No position animation
item.description:
Each item will have a "small image position" setting. Through this setting you can obtain animations like the two next items.

Also keep in mind that the description text is not mandatory - the next item doesn't have any.

item.title: Position animation right
item.description:
HTML Formatted Description

All descriptions can be formatted acording to your preferences of color, style, size, bold etc. using html tags. You could even add images if you wanted to.

Text shadow can be disabled or customized in the source.

item.title: Panning large images
item.description:
This is an awesome feature !

You can enable/disable image panning for each image, which means you can use huge images and the users will still be able to see all their details.

item.title: <font color="#ff7e00" size="18">Title</font><font color="#ffeb9b" size="18"> HTML Tags</font> Support
item.description: Just like the description, the title of each item can be formatted using html tags so you can change color, size, bold etc. Also notice the position of this description.

item.title: Supports .SWF Files
item.description:
This Accordion Image Menu supports .swf animated flash files and most importantly it will apply any effects you set.
For instance this one in the normal state is desaturated and blurred.
